name: Saint Kotar: The Yellow Mask + The Crawling Man Bundle
name_original: Saint Kotar: The Yellow Mask + The Crawling Man Bundle
description:
The adventure game Saint Kotar has Kickstarter in its DNA. The game would have never been developed without the successful crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter in 2020.

Now, as part of this bundle for one special price, you can get the game and its additional content that helped Saint Kotar to get funded, along with the interactive comic book that was created to reward the Kickstarter backers for their support.

The main game Saint Kotar, the prologue Saint Kotar: The Yellow Mask, and the interactive comic book Saint Kotar: The Crawling Man have interlinked stories, world, lore and characters.

Saint Kotar: The Yellow Mask + The Crawling Man Bundle includes: Saint Kotar: The Yellow Mask - Follow the fear of Benedek Dohnany and Nikolay Kalyakin and play the onset of a dark and chilling narrative adventure. Make decisions and affect the events that precede a macabre series of murders, allegedly related to devil worship and witchcraft. Saint Kotar: The Crawling Man - This is a story about the fall of a man. Told in the form of an interactive comic book with sounds and animations, Saint Kotar: The Crawling Man follows the appalling life of Mojse, his fall from a beloved teacher to a bitter and vengeful leader of a sinister cult.

System requirements, languages, bonus goodies and features may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
